title: Kinda Funny Live 3 World Premiere Livestream Trailer
description:
Giveaway Livestream Pre-Show Event:
Sunday, July 23rd 11AM-5PM PT http://twitch.tv/kindafunnygames (Free for everyone!)

Kinda Funny Live 3  World Premiere Livestream with Kinda Funny watching along in the chat:
Sunday, July 23rd 5PM PT ($10 Patreon Subscribers only) 
http://www.patreon.com/kindafunny


Kinda Funny Live 3 YouTube On-Demand:
Monday, July 24th 9AM PT ($10 Patreon Subscribers only)
Monday, July 31st 9AM PT (Free for everyone!)



Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunny?sub_confirmation=1

Follow us on Twitter!
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Nick - http://www.twitter.com/Nick_Scarpino
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

transcript_chunks.text: You are the people who matter. And to be clear to everyone watching this later hopefully not January 5th, 2018. I don't mean the people in this room. I mean the people who adapt to our message in the building. The show goes on. We dream so long. Anybody ever wonder? Heat. Heat. Heat. We love you. We love you. We love you. We love you. We love you. We love you.
